verses.text: I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \add thee\add*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, with my whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; I will shew \w forth|strong="H5608"\w* all thy marvellous \w works|strong="H6381"\w*.
I will be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* and \w rejoice|strong="H5970"\w* in thee: I will sing \w praise|strong="H2167"\w* to thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, O thou most \w High|strong="H5945"\w*.

When mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* are \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*, they shall \w fall|strong="H3782"\w* and \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* at thy \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*.

For thou hast \w maintained|strong="H6213"\w* my \w right|strong="H4941"\w* and my \w cause|strong="H1779"\w*; thou \w satest|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w judging|strong="H8199"\w* \w right|strong="H6664"\w*.\f + \fr 9.4 \ft maintained…: Heb. made my judgment\f*\f + \fr 9.4 \ft judging right: Heb. judging in righteousness\f*

Thou hast \w rebuked|strong="H1605"\w* the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, thou hast \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, thou hast put \w out|strong="H4229"\w* their \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

O thou \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, \w destructions|strong="H2723"\w* are come to a \w perpetual|strong="H5331"\w* \w end|strong="H8552"\w*: and thou hast \w destroyed|strong="H5428"\w* \w cities|strong="H6145"\w*; their \w memorial|strong="H2143"\w* is \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* with \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.\f + \fr 9.6 \ft O thou…: or, The destructions of the enemy are come to a perpetual end: and their cities hast thou destroyed, etc\f*

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w endure|strong="H3427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: he hath \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* for \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

And he shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w world|strong="H8398"\w* in \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, he shall minister \w judgment|strong="H1777"\w* to the \w people|strong="H3816"\w* in \w uprightness|strong="H4339"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* also will be a \w refuge|strong="H4869"\w* for the \w oppressed|strong="H1790"\w*, a \w refuge|strong="H4869"\w* in \w times|strong="H6256"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.\f + \fr 9.9 \ft a refuge: Heb. an high place\f*

And they that \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* will put their \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in thee: for thou, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, hast not \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* them that \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* thee.

Sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* his \w doings|strong="H5949"\w*.

When he maketh \w inquisition|strong="H1875"\w* for \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, he \w remembereth|strong="H2142"\w* them: he \w forgetteth|strong="H7911"\w* not the \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* of the \w humble|strong="H6035"\w*.\f + \fr 9.12 \ft humble: or, afflicted\f*

Have \w mercy|strong="H2603"\w* upon me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* my \w trouble|strong="H6040"\w* \add which I suffer\add* of them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* me, thou that liftest me \w up|strong="H7311"\w* from the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*:

That I may shew \w forth|strong="H5608"\w* all thy \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* in the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*: I will \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w* in thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.

The \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* are sunk \w down|strong="H2883"\w* in the \w pit|strong="H7845"\w* \add that\add* they \w made|strong="H6213"\w*: in the \w net|strong="H7568"\w* \w which|strong="H2098"\w* they \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* is their own \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \add by\add* the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add which\add* he \w executeth|strong="H6213"\w*: the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* is \w snared|strong="H5367"\w* in the \w work|strong="H6467"\w* of his own \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*. \w Higgaion|strong="H1902"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 9.16 \ft Higgaion: that is, Meditation\f*

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall be \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* into \w hell|strong="H7585"\w*, \add and\add* all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* that \w forget|strong="H7913"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

For the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* shall not \w alway|strong="H5331"\w* be \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w*: the \w expectation|strong="H8615"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* shall \add not\add* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; let not \w man|strong="H0582"\w* \w prevail|strong="H5810"\w*: let the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* be \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Put|strong="H7896"\w* them in \w fear|strong="H4172"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \add that\add* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* themselves \add to be but\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.
